articles.title: Singapore to host 2029 SEA Games - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Singapore will host the 2029 edition of the Southeast Asian Games (SEA Games), 14 years after the event was last held in the country.

In a joint media statement, the Singapore National Olympic Council (SNOC) and Sport Singapore (SportSG) said

articles.title: Beach Road slashing: Crowdfunding launched to help victim pay hospital bills - The Star Online
